original_title: A Ghost and the Boy with a Box on His Head
overview: Theo meets his perfect girl whom no one else can see. Her name is Sadie and she's everything he's envisioned; down to the eerily similar doodles he made while daydreaming about her. Denying the reality that others impose on him about her existence, he fights to hold on to her perfection.
title: A Ghost and the Boy with a Box on His Head
